languages.text: "Засим позвольте мне и господину Данроку вас оставить". {n}Клеменциа и Высокий фактотум кланяются.{/n} "Возможно, если вы займетесь этой последней просьбой, вас это развлечет? Право, ваше пребывание на Даргонусе затянулось, однако сейчас протекторат в достаточно стабильном состоянии, чтобы ваше личное участие в делах не было более необходимым. Слава Вольному Торговцу!"

traits.locale_text: "Засим позвольте мне и господину Данроку вас оставить". {n}Клеменциа и Высокий Фактотум кланяются.{/n} "Возможно, если вы займетесь этой последней просьбой, вас это развлечет? Право, ваше пребывание на Даргонусе затянулось, однако сейчас протекторат в достаточно стабильном состоянии, чтобы ваше личное участие в делах не было более необходимым. Слава Вольному Торговцу!"
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "Засим позвольте мне и господину Данроку вас оставить". {n}Клеменциа и Высокий фактотум кланяются.{/n} "Возможно, если вы займетесь этой последней просьбой, вас это развлечет? Truly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its matters. Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Sur ce, permettez-moi de prendre congé avec maître Danrok. » {n}La chancelière et le haut factotum s'inclinent gracieusement.{/n} « Cette dernière requête sera peut-être une distraction bienvenue ? Votre Seigneurie est présente sur Dargonus depuis un certain temps maintenant. Mais le protectorat connaît une période de relative stabilité qui, pour l'instant, ne nécessite plus l'implication personnelle de Votre Seigneurie dans ses affaires courantes. Gloire {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « Sur ce, permettez-moi de prendre congé avec maître Danrok. » {n}La chancelière et le haut factotum s'inclinent gracieusement.{/n} « Cette dernière requête sera peut-être une distraction bienvenue ? Votre Seigneurie est présente sur Dargonus depuis un certain temps maintenant. Mais le protectorat connaît une période de relative stabilité qui, pour l'instant, ne nécessite plus l'implication personnelle de Votre Seigneurie dans ses affaires courantes. Gloire {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “暂时没有其他事情了，请允许我和丹罗克大师告辞。”{n}宰相与高阶顾问向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“或许最后这个请求可以让您稍微换换心情？确实，大人您已经在达戈努斯呆了很长一段时间。王朝目前的情况已经相对稳定下来，暂时不再需要您亲自处理繁琐的事务。荣耀归于行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “暂时没有其他事情了，请允许我和丹罗克大师告辞。”{n}宰相与高阶顾问向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“或许最后这个请求可以让您稍微换换心情？确实，大人您已经在达戈努斯呆了很长一段时间。王朝目前的情况已经相对稳定下来，暂时不再需要您亲自处理繁琐的事务。荣耀归于行商浪人！”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「ではこれをもちまして、私とダンロック様はお暇させていただきます」{n}法官とハイ・ファクトタムが、あなたにお辞儀をした。{/n}「最後の依頼などは気晴らしになりますでしょうか？確かに、陛下のダルゴナスでのご滞在はかなり長いものとなりました。ですが陛下の保護領は現在、比較的安定した状況下にありますので、当分の間、陛下が個人的に関与なさる必要はないと思われます。自由開拓者に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「ではこれをもちまして、私とダンロック様はお暇させていただきます」{n}法官とハイ・ファクトタムが、あなたにお辞儀をした。{/n}「最後の依頼などは気晴らしになりますでしょうか？確かに、陛下のダルゴナスでのご滞在はかなり長いものとなりました。ですが陛下の保護領は現在、比較的安定した状況下にありますので、当分の間、陛下が個人的に関与なさる必要はないと思われます。自由開拓者に栄光あれ！」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Und würdet Ihr mir und Meister Danrok nun bitte gestatten zu gehen?" {n}Die Kanzlerin und das Hoch-Faktotum verbeugen sich.{/n} "Vielleicht dient Euch ja die letzte Anfrage als willkommene Ablenkung? Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist schon ziemlich lange auf Dargonus. Euer Protektorat befindet sich allerdings in einer Phase relativer Stabilität und erfordert bis auf Weiteres nicht mehr das persönliche Eingreifen Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es lebe {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Und würdet Ihr mir und Meister Danrok nun bitte gestatten zu gehen?" {n}Die Kanzlerin und das Hoch-Faktotum verbeugen sich.{/n} "Vielleicht dient Euch ja die letzte Anfrage als willkommene Ablenkung? "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist schon ziemlich lange auf Dargonus. Euer Protektorat befindet sich allerdings in einer Phase relativer Stabilität und erfordert bis auf Weiteres nicht mehr den persönlichen Einsatz Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es lebe {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}!"
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Tras esto último, y con su venia, maese Danrok y yo nos retiramos». {n}La canciller y el sumo factótum te saludan con una reverencia.{/n} «Quizá esta última solicitud le brinde una oportunidad para amenizar su larga estancia en Dargonus, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su protectorado disfruta de un periodo de relativa estabilidad, y de momento no es menester que se involucre personalmente en la administración. ¡Gloria {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «Tras esto último, y con su venia, maese Danrok y yo nos retiramos». {n}La canciller y el sumo factótum te saludan con una reverencia.{/n} «Quizá esta última solicitud le brinde una oportunidad para amenizar su larga estancia en Dargonus, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su protectorado disfruta de un periodo de relativa estabilidad, y de momento no es menester que se involucre personalmente en la administración. ¡Gloria {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente!».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Diyeceklerim bu kadardı. İzniniz olursa ben ve Üstat Danrok, huzurunuzdan ayrılıyoruz." {n}Şansölye ve Arşıkâhya saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Belki de bu son talep hoş bir değişiklik olur sizin için? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Dargonus'ta kalma süresi gerçekten de oldukça uzun oldu ancak protektoranız artık {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin işleyişe kişisel olarak müdahil olmasını gerektirmeden, görece istikrarlı bir dönemin tadını çıkarabiliyor. Hür Tacir var olsun!"
languages.original_text: "And with that, please allow me and Master Danrok to take our leave." {n}The chancellor and the High Factotum offer you their bows.{/n} "Perhaps that last request will serve as a welcome distraction? Indeed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s stay on Dargonus has been rather long. However, your protectorate is now enjoying a period of relative stability that, for the time being, no longer demands Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s personal involvement in its affairs. Glory to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Hepsi bu, izniniz olursa ben ve Üstat Danrok huzurunuzdan ayrılıyoruz." {n}Şansölye ve Arşıkâhya saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Belki de bu son talep hoş bir değişiklik olur sizin için? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Dargonus'ta kalma süresi gerçekten de oldukça uzun oldu ancak protektoranız artık {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin işleyişe kişisel olarak müdâhil olmasını gerektirmeden, görece istikrarlı bir dönemin tadını çıkarabiliyor. Hür Tacir var olsun!"
traits.speaker: Clemence
